landingPage.our-gooddid: We created a new way to produce audio description using AI
landingPage.project-help: At Beyond Vision, our main goal is to help visually impaired people by giving them more choice in the content they can watch.
landingPage.project-simplify: The process of creating audio description for a movie or a televised show is time consuming and very costly. For independent filmmakers it's almost impossible to make your content available to visually impaired people. Here, at Beyond Vision, we want to give the possibility to everyone to make his content available to ...
